snippet.title: Shadows on the Vatican - Act I: Greed [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
Website: https://www.shadowsonthevatican.com/
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/286360/Shadows_on_the_Vatican_Act_I_Greed/
Twitter: bit.ly/DT_twitter
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShadowsOnTheVatican

The ex-priest James Murphy answers a mysterious call for help from his friend Cristoforo. The disappearance of a briefcase containing compromising documents convinces James that his friend is a victim of something sinister. The Vatican's involvement inspires James to get to the bottom of this mystery...

#adventuregame #pointandclick #shadowsonthevatican
